elements.name: Unsuccessful hotel booking with invalid card number

steps.name: User opens the hotel booking url
User clicks the search panel, provides HotelName "berns",CheckIn_date "29" and CheckOut_date "30"
User selects the first hotel, verifies whether the selected basket detail showing the hotel name, room name with price and then confirms booking
User navigates to payment page, enter necessary personal details like FirstName "Pras", LastName "Chak", PhoneNum "9876569870", Email "abc@gmail.com"
User provides address deatils lile AddressLine1 "Towe1, 17-G", AddressLine2 "South city complex", City "Kolkata", PostCode "700068", Country "India"
User enters payment details with NameOnCard "Prasfutita", CardType "VISA", invalid CardNumber "1234123412341234", ExpiryDate "11/26", CVV "123" and clicks PayNow button
User verifies proper invalid card number error message in payment portal

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected '<div>' to contain text 'Your card number is incorrect h.', but the text was 'Your card number is incorrect.'
    + expected - actual

    -'Your card number is incorrect.'
    +'Your card number is incorrect h.'
